## Your Learning Journey

::: {style="font-size: 0.9em;"}
**Three Progressive Levels:**

::: {.incremental}
- **BASIC** (5-10 lines of code)
  - Essential plots for each data type
  - Base R and ggplot2 fundamentals
  
- **INTERMEDIATE** (10-25 lines)
  - Enhanced visualizations
  - Data wrangling integration
  - Statistical elements
  
- **ADVANCED** (25-100+ lines)
  - Interactive visualizations
  - Animations
  - Dashboards
:::
:::

## Dataset: Public Health Blood Pressure Study

::: {style="font-size: 0.8em;"}
- **200 patients** tracked over 6 months
- **Treatment groups:** Control vs. Intervention
- **Demographics:** Age, Gender, Region
- **Health metrics:** BMI, BP, Cholesterol, Blood Sugar
- **Behaviors:** Smoking, Alcohol, Exercise
- **Outcomes:** Blood pressure at 0, 3, and 6 months

**Perfect for demonstrating:**

- All data types (categorical, continuous, time, geographic)
- Real-world missing data handling
- Clinical research visualization patterns
:::
